When exposed to certain visual stimuli or flashing lights, a very small percentage of people (including those with epilepsy and some undiagnosed individuals) may experience seizures, with symptoms such as dizziness, facial discoloration, eye or face twitching, foaming at the mouth, confusion or loss of consciousness, or uncontrollable muscle spasms. If you, your family, or other household members experience similar symptoms, please consult a doctor before playing the game. If you experience any of the above symptoms while playing, immediately stop playing, seek medical attention as soon as possible, and follow your doctor's advice.
